text: Sha Sha Liu (also known as Liu Shasha) is a female Chinese professional pool player. She is the most successful 9-Ball world champion of all time, having won the Women's WPA World Nine-ball Championship on three occasions, in 2009, 2014 and 2015. Sha Sha won her first world championship in 2009, aged 16. ==References== ==External links== Category:Female pool players Category:Chinese pool players Category:1990s births Category:Living people
title: Liu Shasha
